cards.title: 'God bless his memory,' Obama delivers eulogy at Beau Biden's funeral - Obama delivers the eulogy for Beau Biden - Family and friends honor Beau Biden
cards.teaser: SAN FRANCISCO (AP) â€” When technology breaks down now, people's lives go haywire, too. Wednesday's confounding confluence of computer outages at United Airlines, the New York Stock Exchange and The Wall Street Journal delivered a jolting reminder about our deepening dependence on interconnected networks to get through each day.
